name: Christmas of the Snowmen
description:
After being ignored for years on end, the Snowmen have stolen Santa's Hat! Without it, Christmas will never come! The hopes of Christmas lie in a single Christmas tree that has been brought to life by the hopes of those who believe in Christmas...

It's a battle of the snow, so wield your snowballs as best as you can. Throw them just right and you can get them directly over trees or even trick Snowmen into hitting their own friends.

--- Controls ---

WASD: Move

E or Right Click: Collect Snowballs

Left Click [HOLD]: Charge Snowball

Left Click [RELEASE]: Throw Snowball
